metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000225 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cobbler version Verified as present in Cobbler versions 2.6.11+, but code inspection suggests at least 2.0.0+ or possibly even older versions may be vulnerable contains a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in cobbler-web that can result in Privilege escalation to admin.. This attack appear to be exploitable via "network connectivity". Sending unauthenticated JavaScript payload to the Cobbler XMLRPC API (/cobbler_api).

criterions.comment: cobbler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
